mapper.sql: id, loginacct, userpswd, username, email, authstatus, usertype, realname, cardnum, accttype
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_member where loginacct = #{loginAcct}

realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

accttype = #{accttype,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
